message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.HC 

This paper is about adapting machine translation systems in the real world, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also uses bandit learning techniques, which is a type of reinforcement learning, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) likely sub-categories as well. The paper also discusses user feedback and decision-making, which could fall under cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) respectively.
